Name: PandaSG
About the game: Your name is Panda Pang, whose home is attacked by the contaminated fruit army. Pick up your weapon and resist waves of endless attacks to survive as much as possible. Game features: 1. Unlimited bullets, let you experience the shooting feel freely. 2. The rhythm is fast, and the enemy troops are coming in like a tide. 3. Even if the bullets are unlimited, you still have to test your shooting skills to a certain extent. How to play? Survive as long as possible, purchase your weapon in the panda house after you have earned enough coins.
